newsitem.title: JAPAN: Tankan shows improvement in Japan business outlook.
newsitem.headline: Tankan shows improvement in Japan business outlook.

text.p: The Bank of Japan's (BOJ) "tankan" short-term corporate survey in March, released on Wednesday, showed that the business outlook among major manufacturers had improved since the previous survey in November.

The business diffusion index, a key gauge of corporate sentiment, measures the percentage of firms that expect their business environment to improve minus the percentage that expect it to worsen. The survey covered 9,536 companies, of which 710 were categorised as large.
